ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Dyes: What color from what Item?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes (3 shades) ... Yes (3 shades), but not foraged.../locs are at http://www.eqtraders.com/secrets/finddye.html ... Not really....it s three shades of Red
ygData.messageBody:
>Item - Color Made - Location Found
>Permafrost Crystals - Blue - Ice Goblins in Permafrost
Yes (3 shades)

>Evergreen Leaves - Green - On Ground in Gfay Foriaged (Loc?)
Yes (3 shades), but not foraged.../locs are at http://www.eqtraders.com/secrets/finddye.html

>Sarcoscypha Fungus - Purple - Fungus Men, Innothule
Not really....it's three shades of Red (Rose Red, Blood Red, and I haven't seen the third)
Also found in Upper Guk on Fungus men

>Russet Oxide - Red - Found on Earth Elementals, Steamfont
Nope...it's Brown (1 shade)
Also found on ground around the metal gears in Steamfont

>Iron Oxide - Brown - Earth Elementals, Steamfont, Najena, The Hole
Nope...it's Red Rust (1 shade)
Also found on ground around the metal gears in Steamfont

>Charcoal Black - Black - Mist, Air Elementals, Ecommons, Steamfont
Yes (3 shades)

Also add in Jack 'o Lantern fungus...it's Yellow and has 3 shades (found on Jackos in Unrest or other Scarecrow types like in WK, and laying on the ground in LFay, Faery Camp)

Here's some screenshots if you want to see exact colors:
Mixture of Brown, and 2 Resin Green: http://www.clandlc.com/camo.jpg
Left is 3 Resin Blue, right is 2 Resin Blue: http://www.clandlc.com/blues.jpg
Most've this suit is 2 Resin Red, helm is 3 Resin Green (I think): http://www.clandlc.com/blood.jpg
Red Rose (3 Resin Red): http://www.clandlc.com/red.jpg
Fashion Nightmare...http://www.clandlc.com/bardic.jpg
Helm is 1 Resin Green
BP is 3 Resin Blue
Arms is Red Rust
Pants are 3 Resin Green (I think)
Boots are Brown

--Khelan, Master Smith on Tarew Marr
Bard of 47 Songs
